name: 3 x 3 Burger - In-N-Out
description: Heard of the In-N-Out 3 x 3 Burger? Is In-N-Out Burger's Double Double not filling you up? Well, you are in luck. Hidden on In-N-Out Burger's "secret menu" is a burger called the 3 x 3. As you probably imagined, secret menu's 3 x 3 made up of three 100% pure beef patties, hand-leafed lettuce, tomato, spread, three slices of American cheese, with or without onions, stacked high on a freshly baked bun. Mouth watering yet? Some people find the third patty to be overwhelming, but not us. Treat yourself to a 3 x 3 ... and a nice nap right after. In-N-Out Burger has one of the best secret menus out there, and the 3 x 3 is a prime example why. You are free to get any amount of burgers or slices of cheese that you want. Another staple on the In-N-Out secret menu is the 4 x 4 Burger . Be sure to check out the In-N-Out Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

name: 4 x 4 Burger - In-N-Out
description: Is the In-N-Out Burger's Double Double not filling you up? Tried the 3 x 3 Burger and it wasn't enough either? Well, you are in luck. Hidden on In-N-Out Burger's "secret menu" is a burger called the 4 x 4. That's right an In-N-Out 4x4 includes 4 burgers & 4 slices of cheese! Like you probably guessed this is how it all stacks up - secret menu's 4 x 4 made up of four 100% pure beef patties, hand-leafed lettuce, tomato, spread, three slices of American cheese, with or without onions, stacked high on a freshly baked bun. As you can see by the picture, the In-N-Out 4x4 is a whole lot meat. We suggest this secret menu item only for the biggest eaters as most people won't be able to finish this burger, let alone open their mouth wide enough to take a bite. but, we won't blame you for trying though! Thanks In-N-Out. Be sure to check out the In-N-Out Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

name: Burritodilla - Chipotle
description: Meet the Burritodilla from the Chipotle secret menu, a crunchy, gooey, and incredibly delicious combination of a burrito and quesadilla. The Burritodilla is a smaller, more diet friendly alteration of the Chipotle Quesarito that allows the consumer to eat without the mess of a behemoth burrito. secret to the Burritodilla is that it's essentially a Chipotle Quesadilla (also on secret menu), except only half the fillings of a regular burrito are sandwiched between heaping handfuls of cheese. This glorious mash-up of Chipotle cuisine is then grilled to a perfect crunch. It's an amazing hybrid between a stuffed, flavorful burrito and a straightforward quesadilla. howToOrder The Chipotle Burritodilla: If the server is not aware of secret recipe, have them place a handful of cheese on one side of the burrito and order about half the amount of fillings of a regular burrito on-top of that cheese. Are you a big fan of the grilled bun texture of a grilled cheese sandwich, but have a craving for meat? Or are you just not completely satisfied with a single burger? If either of those are true, you should definitely try out the Patty Melt from the Five Guys Secret Menu! You won't regret it. So check out the Patty Melt if you want something a little different as well as a little cheaper than this monster. Not to be confused with the Double Double which is double meat & double cheese, the Double Meat Burger is made up of two 100% pure beef patties, hand-leafed lettuce, tomato, spread, with or without onions, stacked high on a freshly baked bun. That's double meat - it's perfectly designed for those who want a little extra protein in their meal without the extra cheese. By requesting this item, the team over at In-N-Out Burger will know that you mean business. Be sure to check out the In-N-Out Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

name: Enchirito - Taco Bell
description: The "Enchirito" is one of Taco Bell's tastiest "secret menu" items. And there is a good for reason for its popularity. The Enchirito is an Enchilada stuffed with beef, beans, cheese, and topped with diced onions and smothered in their red sauce. The Enchilada is a perfect mix of an enchilada and a burrito. Is your mouth watering yet? If so, you better get down to Taco Bell and grab yourself an Enchirito or two! We think that the Enchirito belongs as a staple on the menu, but we all know that it's more exciting to keep it to ourselves on the Taco Bell Secret Menu. When ordering, don't forget to grab some of the other Taco Bell secret menu items! In recent news, Taco bell has recently started selling Smothered Burritos that are very similar to the Enchirito, but stuffed with even more ingredients! Be sure to check out the Taco Bell Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

name: Extra Fillings - Chipotle
description: Most people don't know that the Fajitas Veggies that Chipotle cooks up are free toppings on all of their dishes! The servers at Chipotle almost never ask if you want Fajitas, so speak up if you want some! As for the salsa, you aren't limited to just one kind, feel free to load up on all the salsa that you want! That guac on the other hand will cost you a pretty penny... Be sure to check out the Chipotle Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

This means that all you have to do is ask politely for some extra taco shells or a tortilla shell if you like to make your own tacos or burrito if you like. Or for those who like to eat a tortilla shell plain, it's your food, do as you please! Be sure to check out the Chipotle Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

name: Extra Toast - In-N-Out
description: The In-N-Out Extra Toast option is a simple item that can be found on the In-N-Out Burger secret menu . Simply put, by ordering Extra Toast your hamburger buns will be left on the grill for just a minute longer. The result is a bun with an extra crisp bite, something that can completely change your entire burger experience without adding anything to the price. Be careful though, sometimes you might be left with a bun that is just a little too brittle because the chefs don't get this request too often. So if you like the crusts of bread and prefer your toast dark, you gotta ask for and recieve the Extra Toast quickly! Be sure to check out the In-N-Out Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

name: Ferrero Rocher Frappuccino - Starbucks
description: The Starbucks Ferrero Rocher Frappuccino is one of the many delicious chocolate frappuccinos on the Starbucks menu and secret menu. Now, the Ferrero Rocher chocolates are so tasty that you can't stop wolfing them down if given the chance. This Ferrero Rocher Frap was thought up to mimic that irresistible chocolatey goodness. So go ahead and try this chocolate treat the next time you stop in at Starbucks, you won't regret it! Be sure to check out the Starbucks Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

name: Flying Dutchman - In-N-Out
description: The Flying Dutchman at In-N-Out is the most interesting "meal" on secret menu. The Flying Dutchman is two beef patties sandwiched around two slices of cheese. That's it, that is the Flying Dutchman. There's no lettuce, no onions, and definitely no bun. Of course you can always ask for those extra toppings, if so desired. Be sure to check out the In-N-Out Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!
secret: Two Slices of Cheese melted between two Hamburger Patties. That's it.
howToOrder: Simply ask for a "Flying Dutchman". This is a well-known secret. However, if the cashier is new, then you can explain that it is two slices of cheese between two burger patties.

name: Free Extras - In-N-Out
description: The In-N-Out Secret Menu is very expansive and always a great bargain. But are there any completely free upgrades? The answer is yes, there definitely are. You are welcome to ask for extra lettuce, tomato, and onion on any burger. And if you want to get a little more adventurous, feel free to ask for a Mustard Grilled Patty , hot peppers, or even Whole Grilled Onions . And if you want to try a burger that has a little bit of everything, then you have to check out In-N-Out's Animal Style Burger . You can even ask for In-N-Out Special Spread Packets or Hot Pepper Packets on the side. The best part of all is that these things are COMPLETELY FREE to add to your burger! Be sure to check out the In-N-Out Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!
secret: Free Extra Toppings, Special Spread Packets, & Hot Peppers
howToOrder: Ask for Special Spread Packets or Hot Pepper Packets when you pick up your order. Or if you want them put on your burger for you, ask for extra of any of the normal fixin's when you place your order.

name: French Vanilla Frappuccino - Starbucks
description: The Starbucks "French Vanilla Frappuccino" is another one of the Starbucks Secret Menu Frappuccinos that puts its own spin on a classic dessert. French vanilla is one of the most popular ice cream flavors, so why wouldn't they create a frozen drink to taste like this creamy dessert? That's why someone created the recipe for the French Vanilla Frappuccino. The French Vanilla Frap is a delicious Starbucks frap if you are looking for something a little closer to a milkshake while at Starbucks. Be sure to check out the Starbucks Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

name: Fresh Cilantro - Chipotle
description: The Chipotle Fresh Cilantro option is one great free extra that you can request from the Chipotle "secret menu". Chipotle doesn't advertise this option very well, but Fresh Cilantro can be added to any order FREE OF CHARGE. Tossing a bit of this fresh herb onto your Chipotle order adds a little zip of both flavor and color to whatever you've ordered. So, if you like the extra kick of cilantro in your food, make sure to ask your server to put add an extra pinch of cilantro to your plate! In our opinion, Fresh Cilantro is worth asking for. You won't see fresh cilantro on the serving table at Chipotle, there're keeping it hidden just for your order - after all, that's what the Chipotle Secret Menu is all about! Be sure to check out the Chipotle Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!
secret: Fresh Cilantro can be added to any item

name: Fried Chicken Club - Chick-fil-A
description: The "Fried Chicken Club" is one of Chick-fil-A's more common "secret menu" items. So, if you love the original sandwich, but would like a slightly healthier meal with the addition of a few vegetables then ask for the Fried Chicken Club at Chick-fil-A. They'll add a nice tomato slice and a piece of lettuce, plus put it on a slightly larger bun. Although it's not as healthy as the Chicken Club on their regular menu, which contains a char-broiled chicken breast, it has that original recipe coating deep fried into the chicken. After all, isn't that the reason you drive to Chick-fil-A in the first place? Be sure to check out the Chick-fil-A Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!
secret: The chicken club sandwich with original fried chicken instead of char-broiled chicken

name: Fries with Big Mac Sauce - McDonalds
description: TheFries with Big Mac Sauce" option is one of McDonald's more famous "secret menu" items. And for good reason! The Big Mac sauce is amazing, and the combination of freshly cooked fries along with the big mac sauce make an irresistible combination. How good does that sound? So, if you're a fan of the Big Mac, take a chance by asking for Fries with Big Mac Sauce from McDonalds Secret Menu. In our opinion, the Fries with Big Mac Sauce are so good that it should be on the menu. When ordering, don't forget about the other secret menu options available at McDonald's! Be sure to check out the McDonalds Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!
secret: Big Mac Sauce to dip your Fries in!
howToOrder: Ask for some Big Mac Sauce on the side when you place your order.

name: Frings - Burger King
description: The Burger King Secret Menu has a lot of interesting burgers and sandwiches, but who knew that they had the genius to come up with Frings ! What are Frings , you ask? Well, the crispy BK Frings are a treat that is the best of both worlds when it comes to side orders. The Burger King Fring masterpiece is a half order of French Fries and a half order of their Onion Rings. Can't decide?... you're not alone, it's a tough decision deciding between these two options. Luckily, at Burger King (if you know secret) you aren't forced to make such a decision. Why order both when you can slim down and get the best of both worlds at the same time with Burger King Frings? When you get your favorite burger, don't forget to grab yourself a side order of Frings. This is the cherry on top of the Burger King Secret Menu. Be sure to check out the Burger King Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

name: Frito Pie - Sonic
description: The Frito Pie from the Sonic "secret menu" is quite popular in the South. But what is this "Frito Pie" exactly? It's a heaping pile of Fritos smothered in chili and nacho cheese. In other words, it's sinfully delicious and available at a Sonic near you. Don't be afraid of this Frito pie, it's too good to pass up. And, you know what goes really good with a Frito Pie? - a Dr. Pepper Orgasm. Sonic Drive-in has some of the most interesting secret menu items, but you may want to check out the Jamba Juice Secret Menu, the Starbucks Secret Menu, and the McDonald's Secret Menu. Give these other guys a good look, you may not have heard of some of these hidden menu items that have been right in front of you all along! Be sure to check out the Sonic Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

This DQ frozen hot chocolate treat made with hot chocolate and chopped up ice cubes may only be available in some areas on a seasonal basis, but in certain locations you may be able to order it all year long. The only way you'll know for sure is if you ask. And this DQ Frozen Hot Chocolate treat is definitely worth asking for! Be sure to check out the Dairy Queen Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

name: Fruity Pebbles - Jamba Juice
description: The Jamba Juice "Fruity Pebbles" Smoothie is a delicious cereal-inspired smoothie from the Jamba Juice Secret Menu. The Fruity Pebbles Smoothie is a sweeter smoothie than your usual fruit & sherbet based smoothie. The purely flavored sherbert and soy milk smoothie ends with a sweet and creamy concoction that is like a milk shake that used sherbert instead of ice cream. The Fruity Pebbles Smoothie is incredible and really sweet, there's not much more we can say about it. If you are looking for something a little sweeter and tastes like Fruity Pebbles, then this is the smoothie that you want. Be sure to check out the Jamba Juice Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

Fruity Pebbles are one of the most popular cereal brands, so why wouldn't Starbucks create a frozen drink to taste like this breakfast favorite? That's exactly why someone created the recipe for the Fruity Pebbles Frappuccino. The Starbucks Fruity Pebbles Frappuccino is a yummy one if you are looking for something a little closer in taste to a fruit smoothie while at Starbucks. Most of the die-hard Starbucks fans love the Thin Mint Frappuccino , but that may be because they haven't heard of the lesser known "Grasshopper Frappuccino". This secret frappuccino from starbucks tastes a lot more like mint chocolate chip ice cream, but hey they are both great! So why not check out the Grasshopper Frappuccino when you are in the mood for something minty and refreshing? You won't regret it. Be sure to check out the Starbucks Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

name: Green Eye - Starbucks
description: The "Starbucks Green Eye" from the Starbucks Secret Menu is a regular coffee (which can be ordered either iced or hot) with THREE shots of Espresso added. Yes, you read that right 3 shots! This drink is the ultimate caffeinated drink on the Starbucks secret menu. If you want a little boost of caffeine in your cup without going overboard, try either of the less-caffeinated drinks: the two shot Black Eye or the one shot Red Eye . We guess that the Green Eye means "go, go, go" because that's all you're going to be doing with that much caffeine flowing through your veins. So, hey, if your body is in desperate need of caffeine, grab a Starbucks Green Eye. Be sure to check out the Starbucks Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

This isn't your mother's grilled cheese sandwich though. secret menu In-N-Out Grilled Cheese is two slices of melted American cheese, hand-leafed lettuce, tomato, spread, with or without onions on a freshly baked bun. This is the vegetarian option at In-N-Out. Sounds like a great snack, right? If you are going for a full meal, we suggest you compliment your Grilled Cheese with another item off of the In-N-Out secret menu, such as Animal Style Fries . Be sure to check out the In-N-Out Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

name: Grilled Ham & Cheese - Sonic
description: The "Grilled Ham and Cheese" sandwich from the Sonic "secret menu" adds a little protein to an otherwise simple grilled cheese sandwich. While a grilled cheese is a staple item at Sonic, you can make it even better by adding ham to it. This is the greatness of the Sonic secret menu. The Grilled Ham and Cheese is so good that you won't ever want to go back to a plain grilled cheese. So order up big, because you can combine that cheesy goodness with a couple of slices of ham. You won't regret it! Be sure to check out the Sonic Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

name: Grilled Onions (Whole) - In-N-Out
description: The In-N-Out secret menu allows more customization of the Onion preparation than one might think. The burgers come normally with a whole slice of raw onion. And most people know that you can get your onions grilled, and they come grilled to perfection and chopped up into little bits. But did you know that you can get a whole slice of grilled onion on your In-N-Out burger? Well you can! In fact, you can even get all three onion options on a single burger if you are crazy enough to try it! Be sure to check out the In-N-Out Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

name: Gummy Bear (Chocolate) - Jamba Juice
description: The Jamba Juice "Chocolate Gummy Bear" Smoothie is one of our favorite candy-flavored smoothies from the Jamba Juice Secret Menu. The Gummy Bear Smoothies are sweeter than the standard smoothies since they utilize juice, milk, multiple fruits and sherberts, plus the addition of gummy bear candies. If the restaurant has the ingredients on hand, you may get lucky and be able to land yourself one of these rare Hot Pocket Bowls. The Hot Pocket Bowl features a hot pocket of dough (with chicken) covered in loads of cheese, gravy and even corn. Yum! So get out there and see if your local KFC can make one of these hot pocket bowls. name: Land, Sea, and Air Burger - McDonalds
description: The "Land, Sea, and Air" burger is one of McDonald's largest "secret menu" items. This behemoth of a burger is stuffed with proteins from the Land (beef), Sea (fish), and Air (chicken). Some people even add fries to this monster burger. You order a Big Mac, a Filet-O-Fish, and a McChicken all at once. Then you put the McChicken and Filet-O-Fish patties inside the Big Mac along with however many buns you want (depending on how wide your mouth will open) and enjoy! Voila - a Land Sea and Air Burger ! How tasty does that sound? So, if a normal Big Mac doesn't quite fill you up, take a chance by creating a Land, Sea, and Air Burger from McDonalds Secret Menu. In our opinion, the Land, Sea, and Air Burger is more than enough to satisfy anybody's appetite. When ordering, don't forget to order a big drink to wash it down! Be sure to check out the McDonalds Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

name: Large Milkshakes - In-N-Out
description: It's so simple, right? Upon request, you can order both In-N-Out Large Milk Shakes and In-N-Out Extra Large Milk Shakes off of In-N-Out secret menu . In-N-Out are famous for their delicious milkshakes, but they disappear so quickly. But if you know secret to ordering a large or extra-large then the goodness can last much longer. There isn't mush else to say, other than that In-N-Out's milk shakes go great with their fries and burgers. So, treat yourself to a large or an extra large shake off of the In-N-Out secret menu. You can even try secret Neapolitan Shake . Yum! Be sure to check out the In-N-Out Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

name: Lava Anything - Taco Bell
description: The Taco Bell Lava Anything is an option on their secret menu. You have the option to "Lava Anything" - meaning that you can add spicy cheese sauce to any item on the regular menu. This is a very popular "secret menu" option at Taco Bell restaurants. If you are a fan of their Lava Sauce from their Volcano Taco, then you have got to try to Lava Anything on the menu. The spicy Lava Sauce can pack a punch, but who doesn't like to give their taste buds a workout? Now, if you are not afraid of this spicy nacho cheese sauce, then order your entree and "Lava Anything" that you can. We suggest adding it to any of the regular tacos, or switching out some of the other sauces to add another dimension of flavor to your meal. When ordering, don't forget to grab some of the other Taco Bell secret menu items! And if the Taco Bell Secret Menu isn't enough for you, you may also enjoy the McDonalds Secret Menu , the Starbucks Secret Menu , and the Jamba Juice Secret Menu . So why not check out some of the other secret menu hacks from your favorite fast food restaurants? You won't be disappointed! Be sure to check out the Taco Bell Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

name: Liquid Cocaine - Starbucks
description: The "Starbucks Liquid Cocaine" from the Starbucks Secret Menu is one of the most intense drinks you can get, it's guaranteed to shock your system with this caffeine packed drink. The Liquid Cocaine from Starbucks starts with a glass of ice in a Grande cold cup, upon which 4 shots of Espresso (yes, FOUR) and 4 pumps of White Chocolate Syrup are poured over. This caffeine overload is not for your average Starbucks customer, it is an intense drink for those experienced hackers of the Starbucks secret menu. So, if you aren't afraid of this beast, you should go out and try it for yourself. However, if you want to tame the drink a bit, just ask your Starbucks barista to top it off with some milk and stir...there is no shame in that. If the liquid cocaine is still a bit too strong but you want a little boost of caffeine in your cup without going overboard, try either of the less-caffeinated drinks: the two shot Black Eye or the one shot Red Eye . If you are a caffeine junkie and relish the power of the Liquid Cocaine you may want to try the uber-caffeinated Green Eye as well from the Starbucks Secret Menu . Be sure to check out the Starbucks Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

name: Loaded Grilled Breakfast Sandwich - Jack In The Box
description: The "Loaded Grilled Breakfast Sandwich" is the traditional Jack in the Box Grilled Breakfast Sandwich that you load with extras. The basic sandwich comes with two fried eggs, two slices of ham, two strips of bacon and two slices of melted cheese. Start there and then add your other favorite items... maybe some turkey, add some sausage, load it with extra bacon. Basically, you can have a Loaded Grilled Breakfast Sandwich any way you want it. Be sure to check out the Jack In The Box Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

description: The "Made-to-Order Burgers" options at Sonic are quite impressive. This Sonic "secret menu" option is hardly an option at all, it leaves your burger up to whatever your imagination (and stomach) can handle! What you see on the traditional menu is just a small fraction of the ones they make. There's the Dixie Cheeseburger, the Thousand Island Jr. Cheeseburger, the California Cheeseburger, and the Super Sonic Jalapeno Cheeseburger, to name a few. If you'd like a burger that's not currently on the menu, just ask. They probably have all the ingredients on hand needed to make one of secret menu items so have your burger made-to-order. Be sure to check out the Sonic Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

description: At Dairy Queen they have a DQ Marshmallow Creme Sundae that is secret, yet fabulous. The DQ marshmallow cream sundae is vanilla ice cream with marshmallow cream on top. Now this marshmallow creme is too good to be only available on only that one sundae. So what do you do? You ask them if they could add some of this delicious marshmallow creme to any frozen treat of your choice, of course! Be sure to check out the Dairy Queen Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

name: Mc10:35 - McDonalds
description: The "Mc10:35" brunch sandwich is one of McDonald's most difficult to obtain "secret menu" items. And for good reason! The Mc10:35 is only available during the brief window of opportunity when both the breakfast and regular menu items at McDonald's are available, which is 10:30 - 11:00 at most McDonald's. That's a small window, but it's worth ordering this combo if you happen to be there at the right time. This combo burger & breakfast sandwich combines the best of both menus. Order an Egg McMuffin as well as a McDouble. Next, place the two McDouble patties and cheese straight into the McMuffin and enjoy! How tasty does that sound? So, if you are looking to have the perfect brunch, go get yourself a Mc10:35 from the McDonalds secret menu. Be sure to check out the McDonalds Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

name: McCrepe - McDonalds
description: The "McCrepe" breakfast is one of McDonald's most famous "secret menu" items. But this is another DIY (do-it-yourself) item on the McDonald's secret menu. In addition to the hotcake, the McCrepe is loaded with the yogurt parfait and can even be topped with granola and syrup. How tasty does that sound? So, if a normal breakfast isn't enough to start your day off right, take a chance by ordering both the hotcakes and a yogurt parfait at McDonald's. Then you take the yogurt and pour it into a hotcake and fold - you've just made your own McCrepe from McDonalds Secret Menu. In our opinion, the McCrepe is just enough to satisfy a hearty appetite. When ordering, don't forget all the other secret menu items available from secret menu at McDonald's! Be sure to check out the McDonalds Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

name: McDonalds Dipping Sauces - McDonalds
description: The "McDonalds Dipping Sauces" aren't actually one of the McDonalds "secret menu" items but they aren't exactly out in the open either. If you order the Chicken McNuggets at McDonalds you are usually asked if you would like BBQ sauce with them. But, they seldom offer you the wide range of sauces that they have available, unless of course you know the McDonalds secret menu and can ask for your favorite variety of McDonalds Dipping Sauces . In addition to the regular BBQ sauce, the McDonalds Dipping Sauces include: Sweet and Sour, Honey Mustard, Chipotle BBQ, Tangy BBQ, Spicy Buffalo, Sweet Chili, Hot Mustard, and Creamy Ranch. You won't find that whole list anywhere on the regular menu at McDonalds. If you haven't tried one of these McDonalds Dipping Sauces, take a chance by asking for one from McDonalds Secret Menu. In our opinion, the McNugget Dipping Sauces are not as well known as they should be, that's why we are here to let you know. So, when ordering you McNuggets, don't forget to ask for your favorite of the many McDonalds Dipping Sauces ! Be sure to check out the McDonalds Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

name: McGangbang - McDonalds

Simply order a McDouble and a McChicken. The McChicken Sandwich is placed directly inside of the juicy McDouble, buns and all. So, for $2 you've created a huge tasty sandwich. How tasty does that sound? So, if a normal McDouble doesn't quite fill you up, take a chance by combining a McChicken and a McDouble from McDonalds Secret Menu to create your own McGangbang . In our opinion, the McGangBang is the best bang for your buck. When ordering, don't forget to order a big drink to wash it down! In addition to the Big Mac standard toppings, the McKinley Mac burger includes quarter pound meat patties. Extra juicy for those who enjoy their meat! So, if a normal Big Mac doesn't quite fill you up, take a chance by asking for a McKinley Mac from McDonalds Secret Menu. In our opinion, the McKinley Mac is just enough to satisfy a hearty appetite. When ordering, don't forget to order a big drink to wash it down! Be sure to check out the McDonalds Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

name: McLeprechaun Shake - McDonalds
description: The "McLeprechaun Shake" is one of McDonald's most famous "secret menu" beverages, although it is only available in March of every year. The reason that it can only be found during March is because that is when the Shamrock Shake is available on the McDonald's regular menu. The McLeprechaun shake is the tasty blend of the Shamrock shake and Chocolate flavors that create the smooth tasting McLeprechaun Shake. Chocolate and mint - a classic flavor combination. How amazing does that sound? So, if you are looking for a little something to excite your taste buds, take a chance by asking for a McLeprechaun Shake from McDonalds Secret Menu. In our opinion, the McLeprechaun Shake is the perfect blend of flavors to satisfy your sweet cravings. When ordering, don't forget to order some fries in order to create a blend of sweet & salty goodness! Be sure to check out the McDonalds Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

This rich treat is made up of rich dark cocoa fudge, DQ's famous vanilla soft serve, and bits of truffle all mixed together to make the perfect frozen treat. The best part about it is that you can still order it, even if it's no longer listed as the special treat of the month. name: Monster Mac - McDonalds
description: The "Monster Mac" burger is one of McDonald's meatiest "secret menu" items. In addition to the standard toppings that are included in the regular McDonald's Big Mac, the this monster burger includes a whopping 8 beef patties. That's right, the Monster Mac has 8 burgers piled inside of just one bun - how tasty does that sound? Not at all if you're vegetarian! But, if you're a serious meat eater and a normal Big Mac can't even come close to filling you up (or if you just like a big challenge), then take a chance by asking for a Monster Mac from McDonalds Secret Menu. If you server hasn't heard of the Monster Mac creation then just ask for a Big Mac with 8 beef patties - and you've got the Monster Mac . In our opinion, the Monster Mac is enough to satisfy a few people with hearty appetites or one hungry lumberjack. When ordering, don't forget to order a big drink to wash it down! Be sure to check out the McDonalds Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

name: Mustard Grilled Patty - In-N-Out

By requesting this item, the team over at In-N-Out Burger will slather the patty with mustard before grilling it. The result is a burger with a little more kick. Sounds good, right? If you want to go even further out of the box, we suggest ordering a "Protein Style Burger" with an In-N-Out Mustard Grilled Patty as the flavor just bursts through the lettuce wrap. Enjoy! Be sure to check out the In-N-Out Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

Well, how about you try ordering a Mustard Whopper off the BK Secret Menu? It is the classic Whopper, but the mayonaisse is replaced with a flavor punch of mustard. It is a simple twist, but it really changes the whole Whopper. So why not give this Mustard Whopper from the Burger King secret menu the chance that it deserves, and go get yourself one today! Be sure to check out the Burger King Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

So, if you desire a bowl of fresh Chipotle tortilla chips covered in all of the cheese, beans, meat, vegetables, and whichever salsas your heart desires, then don't be afraid to order Chipotle's Nachos from the Chipotle secret menu! In our opinion, Nachos are great for sharing and satisfy all your cravings. Be sure to check out the Chipotle Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

name: Neapolitan Milkshake - In-N-Out
description: The In-N-Out Neapolitan Milkshake is a popular item on In-N-Out Burger secret menu for those who just can't decide on which flavor milkshake they want. The simple In-N-Out Burger menu offers only three choices when it comes to their milkshakes: chocolate, strawberry and vanilla. However, by ordering an In-N-Out Neapolitan Milkshake off of secret menu, you will receive a milk shake that has been blended with all three flavors! Pretty cool, huh? name: Neapolitan Shake - McDonalds

name: Old Cut - Subway
description: The Subway Old Cut was once the only way that Subway cut their sandwiches. Now, that was over 10 years ago that they stopped cutting their sandwiches this way. However, you may get lucky and find a Subway artisan who knows this secret menu trick and is willing to cut your sub the Old Cut way. If you happen to find that special person, you sure as heck better stick with them as they show you how a Subway sandwich from their secret menu should be made. There's just something about the way the old cut holds in the ingredients that brightens your whole experience and makes everything taste that much better. So, try a Subway Old Cut today and see what you've been missing. If the Subway Secret Menu isn't enough for you, you may also enjoy the McDonalds Secret Menu , the Starbucks Secret Menu , and the Jamba Juice Secret Menu . All of these great milkshakes, frappuccinos, and smoothies from these restaurants would be a great compliment or sweet dessert for your Subway sandwich! Be sure to check out the Subway Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

name: Patty Melt - Five Guys
description: The Patty Melt is a classic sandwich with a Hamburger Patty as the base. A Patty Melt usually consists of warm melty cheese, grilled onions, and a burger all sandwiched between two slices of bread, or buns, that are grilled up on a frying pan or flat griddle. At Five Guys, however, you can get as many free toppings as you would like on your "Patty Melt" from the 5 Guys secret menu. You can even get as many Hamburger Patties as your heart desires! Hopefully not too many, this isn't the most heart-friendly meal out there. This is a delicious and refreshing take on the "build your own burger" experience at 5 Guys. Are you a big fan of the grilled bun texture of a grilled cheese sandwich, but have a craving for meat? If so, you should definitely try out the Patty Melt from the Five Guys Secret Menu! You won't regret it. And check out the Double Grilled Cheese Burger that reportedly exits...if you want something even cheesier! Be sure to check out the Five Guys Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

description: The Poor Man's Big Mac from the McDonald's Secret Menu should be one of the most popular secret menu items at McDonalds! Not only are you cutting out some unnecessary calories from the third slice of bread and second slice of cheese in a 550 Calorie Big Mac ; you are also cutting down on the price as well. A Big Mac will run you $3.99 while the Poor Man's Big Mac will only cost you around $1.49! You might even want to take a moment to check out the full list of McDonalds Menu prices while you're here. Now, you can check below and see howToOrder a Poor Man's Big Mac, but we'll go ahead and let you in on what secret is. A Poor Man's Big Mac is a McDouble with extra Lettuce and Big Mac Sauce. But don't forget to tell them that you don't want the standard Ketchup and Mustard, we only want the good stuff, that delicious Big Mac Sauce. Be sure to check out the McDonalds Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

description: Yes, that's right, Poutine. But, you may ask, what's KFC Poutine ? KFC Poutine is a delicious Canadian delicacy that can sometimes be ordered in the U.S. KFC fast food locations. Basically, it's a huge plate of French fries with fresh (piping hot) cheese curds smothered in gravy. Now you may get some funny looks for ordering poutine from your local KFC, but some restaurants will make it for you if they have the ingredients in stock. Getting KFC Poutine , along with all of the other so-called "secret menu" items, is really a matter of simply asking for them. Be sure to check out the KFC Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!

The children's size is made from two soft taco shells while the full size Quesadilla uses the normal burrito tortilla folded in half. name: Quesarito - Taco Bell
description: The Chipotle Quesarito burrito is the Holy Grail of the Chipotle Secret Menu , and it's easy to see why it has become all the rage. The popularity of the monstrous Quesarito is due to the fact that it is a burrito in which the "shell" of the burrito is actually a Cheese Quesadilla . That's right, instead of using a plain flour tortilla like the unfortunate soul next to you, the Chipotle servers will start your Quesarito off with a quesadilla they make from sandwiching a heaping amount of cheese between two tortilla shells and heating it in the warmer while you wait. Once you have the quesadilla, the process is back to normal, just tell the server what items and meat you want inside your Quesarito burrito and they will wrap it up and check you out. Without a doubt, eating the Chipotle Quesarito is a life changer. On each and every bite you will taste the delicious crunch on the grilled shell, followed quickly by the gooey Monterey Jack Cheese between the shells that encase the meat and fillings. But be warned, it is an extremely delicious and addictive burrito that will keep you coming back to Chipotle's secret menu. Alternate Version: A variation on the above recipe for the Quesarito has also been appearing. For this alternate version, the servers will create the cheese quesadilla using only one shell and then open it back up. This creates a gooey cheese lining covering the entire inside of the shell and all of the burrito fillings placed on-top. While the single-shell version is delicious, be sure to tell the server you want the two-shell version if they start to fold your Quesarito in half. Be sure to check out the Chipotle Secret Menu as well as visiting our home page to check out the complete list of All secret Menus from all your favorite restaurants!
secret: A Cheesy layer in between two burrito shells. This Quesadilla is used as the shell to wrap up your burrito fillings!
